attributes.action: introduce 1st time home buyer grants for young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We require the prime minister to make certain that all 1st time buyers. can buy a home and have it 100% theirs without fear of Financial problems. in sort we wish the goverment to set up 1st time buyer grants to be readily avalible to cover the deposit and part of the mortgage.
